statements: SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT preference_1, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 = 'value1' AND preference_2 = 'value2';
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_3 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 LIKE '%pattern%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT preference_1, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 = 'value';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 LIKE '%abc%' OR preference_2 = 'xyz';
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_3 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 IS NOT NULL AND preference_3 IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, preference_3, preference_2, preference_1 FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 = 'Value';
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, product_name, price FROM purchase_history WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT preference_1, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, purchase_date, product_name, price FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY price ASC, purchase_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT preference_1 FROM customer_preferences
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_id, preference_name FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_id > 3 ORDER BY preference_name ASC;
SELECT total_amount, purchase_date FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, target_audience FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT preference_name FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(preference_id) AS preference_count FROM customer_preferences GROUP BY customer_id HAVING preference_count > 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_name FROM targeted_campaigns WHERE start_date <= '2023-01-01' AND end_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM campaign_history WHERE interaction_type = 'Click' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM targeted_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM purchase_history WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' OR product_name LIKE '%pants%';
SELECT COUNT(campaign_id) AS total_interactions, interaction_type FROM campaign_history GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;

SELECT products.name, products.price, customers.name AS customer_name FROM products INNER JOIN purchases ON products.product_id = purchases.product_id INNER JOIN customers ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(product_id) AS num_products_purchased FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_products_purchased > 2;

SELECT customers.name AS customer_name, marketing_campaigns.name AS campaign_name FROM customers LEFT JOIN customer_preferences ON customers.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id LEFT JOIN marketing_campaigns ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = customer_preferences.preference_value WHERE preference_name = 'Campaign' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
